info.name: Tifto Admin API - GraphQL
info.description: Complete GraphQL API collection for Tifto Admin backend. Contains all 118 operations including queries, mutations, and subscriptions.

request.description: Login mutation for admin/owner. Returns authentication token and user details. Token is automatically saved to collection variable.
Get dashboard user counts (users, vendors, restaurants, riders)
Get dashboard user counts filtered by year
Get dashboard orders grouped by type
Get dashboard sales grouped by type
Get restaurant dashboard orders and sales statistics
Get vendor dashboard statistics card details

item.name: User Management
item.description: User management operations - queries and mutations for user data

request.description: Get all users with their details
Get user details by user ID

item.name: Vendor Management
item.description: Vendor management operations - queries and mutations for vendor data

item.name: Restaurant Management
item.description: Restaurant management operations - queries and mutations for restaurant data

request.description: Update restaurant delivery bounds and location
Update food item out of stock status

item.name: Order Management
item.description: Order management operations - queries and mutations for order data

request.description: Get active orders for a restaurant
Assign a rider to an order

item.name: Food & Category Management
item.description: Food, category, subcategory, addon, and option management operations

request.description: Get all foods by restaurant ID
Delete a food item by ID
Get all categories by restaurant ID
Get subcategories by parent category ID
Get all addons by restaurant ID
Get all options by restaurant ID

item.name: Rider Management
item.description: Rider management operations - queries and mutations for rider data

item.name: Configuration
item.description: System configuration operations - email, payment, Firebase, and other settings

graphql.query:
query getConfiguration {
  configuration {
    _id
    email
    emailName
    currency
    currencySymbol
    deliveryRate
    googleApiKey
    firebaseKey
    authDomain
    projectId
    storageBucket
    msgSenderId
    appId
    measurementId
    vapidKey
  }
}

request.description: Get ticket users with their latest ticket
Get support tickets for a user
Get a single support ticket by ID
Create a message in a support ticket

item.name: Financial
item.description: Financial operations - withdraw requests, earnings, transactions, tipping, and commission

request.description: Get transaction history for a vendor
Update commission rate for a restaurant

item.name: Other Features
item.description: Additional features - zones, banners, cuisines, shop types, coupons, reviews, staff, timings, delivery options, tokens, app versions, and audit logs

request.description: Delete a shop type by ID
Delete a staff member by ID
Upload push notification token for a user

item.name: Subscriptions
item.description: GraphQL subscriptions for real-time updates. Note: These require WebSocket connection at {{ws_endpoint}}. For testing subscriptions, use a WebSocket client or GraphQL Playground.

request.description: Subscribe to new orders for a restaurant. Requires WebSocket connection at {{ws_endpoint}}
Subscribe to order updates. Requires WebSocket connection at {{ws_endpoint}}
Subscribe to rider updates. Requires WebSocket connection at {{ws_endpoint}}
